old:
どいつもこいつも！
しみったれた面しやがってよぉ！
column2:
All of them!
They've got a sullen look on their faces!
speaker: Bob

old:
はぁ～、酒くらいしか楽しみがねぇのに
どうすりゃいいんだまったく！
column2:
I've got nothing to look forward to but drinking.
What am I going to do now?
speaker: Bob

old: 酒のアテ、次はどうすっかなぁ
column2: Lord, what should I have with this alcohol?
speaker: Bob
